title: ABC for kids: bumper collection
brief_description: A collection of children’s classic television for the very young to enjoy. “Invisible Bananas” and “Teddy chase”, the lovable Bananas In Pyjamas have fun with the teddies in these two episodes. “Postman Pat and the suit of armour”, Postman Pat helps get Garner Hall ready to be open to the public. “The Kite”, Brum the little car helps to rescue a runaway kite. “Where’s Spot?” and “Spot follows his nose”, little Spot the dog hides from his mum and looks for something that smells nice in these two episodes. “Thomas comes to breakfast” and “Four Little Engines”, Thomas the Tank Engine and Friends get up to mischief in these two episodes. “Hey hey Blinky Bill”, “Whistle Song” and “Earthquake”, two songs with Blinky Bill followed by an episode about his gang getting stuck in an old mine. “Pingu as chef” and “Pingu as baby sitter”, enjoy Pingu the penguin’s adventures as he pops popcorn and then looks after twin babies in these two episodes. “Party at Owl’s House”, join in the party with Little Bear and his friends as they have a “because” party.
